theDefault: QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
theDefault: QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw a card

theDefault: Focusfire.NAME: Focus fire
theDefault: Focusfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Magic 3: does !M! bonus damage.

theDefault: BattleSense.NAME: Battle Sense
theDefault: BattleSense.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Gain an aditional Dexterity when upgraded

theDefault: ShortTerm.NAME: Short Term Investmenet
theDefault: ShortTerm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mana. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 more than the Mana you have gained.

theDefault: Flare.NAME: Flare
theDefault: Flare.DESCRIPTION: apply 2 Vulnerable and remove 1 Strength on all enemies, NL When upgraded, apply an aditional Vulnerable

theDefault: Overhead.NAME: Overhead Swing
theDefault: Overhead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if it kills, NL apply 1 Vulnerable and reduce the Strength of a random enemy by 1.

theDefault: TransMind.NAME: Transencent Mindset
theDefault: TransMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 intangable, gain !M! Vulnerable. NL using this card increases the Vulnerable you get for the rest of combat.

theDefault: ReinArmor.NAME: Reinforce Armor
theDefault: ReinArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Magic 3: consume 1 Mana to increase the plated armor you get by 1.

theDefault: SpecShot.NAME: Specialized Shot
theDefault: SpecShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Magic 3: Apply !M! Poison and 1 Decay. NL Magic 5: Apply !M! Poison again and apply !M!-1 Weak.

theDefault: PowerNap.NAME: Power Nap
theDefault: PowerNap.DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 Mana to Gain !M! Regen. NL Magic 4: Gain an aditional Regen

theDefault: Corrupt.NAME: Corrupt
theDefault: Corrupt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Decay, Apply !Mx2! Vulnerable, 1 Weak and 1 Strength. NL Apply !M! Poison and !Mp1! decay to all enemies.

theDefault: EmbraceDarkness.NAME: Embrace Darkness
theDefault: EmbraceDarkness.DESCRIPTION: gain !M! mana, gain !D! decay and draw !M! card(s).

theDefault: InfernalForm.NAME: Infernal Form
theDefault: InfernalForm.DESCRIPTION: You do not take damage from Decay. At the end of your turn, gain Mana equal to your Decay. You take twice as much damage from Poison. NL Ethereal(loses Ethereal).

theDefault: ToxicWall.NAME: Toxic Wall
theDefault: ToxicWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL This turn upon being attacked gain 1 Decay and apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

theDefault: SpreadCorruption.NAME: Spread Corruption
theDefault: SpreadCorruption.DESCRIPTION: At the Start of your turn, consume !M! Mana to apply !M! poison and decay to everyone.

theDefault: LongTerm.NAME: Long Term Investment
theDefault: LongTerm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn and next turn, lose half(a third) of your Mana. At the start of the following 3 turns, gain half(two thirds) of your current Mana.

theDefault: MagicArmor.NAME: Magic Armor
theDefault: MagicArmor.DESCRIPTION: convert all of your mana into plated armor.

theDefault: InnerHeaven.NAME: Inner Heaven
theDefault: InnerHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Decay. NL Gain 1 Mana per 5(4) Decay lost. NL Gain 1 Energy per 10(9) Decay lost.

theDefault: Overload.NAME: Overload
theDefault: Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mana. NL Magic 5(3): gain 2 Mana. NL Magic 15(10): Double your Mana.

theDefault: SappingStrike.NAME: Sapping Strike
theDefault: SappingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Mana. NL Magic 3: Gain 1 Mana

theDefault: DarkmagicSlice.NAME: Darkmagic Slice
theDefault: DarkmagicSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Magic 3: Does 5 aditional damage. NL magic 15: double damage.

theDefault: ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
theDefault: ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Mana to do !D! Damage 3 times.

theDefault: BreakTheseCuffs.NAME: Break These Cuffs
theDefault: BreakTheseCuffs.DESCRIPTION: Convert all Vulnerable, Weak and Frail into Decay. NL Exaust
theDefault: BreakTheseCuffs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert all Vulnerable, Weak and Frail into Decay.

theDefault: DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDefault: DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDefault: DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A better defend
theDefault: DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.NAME: for each loop x2
theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theDefault: DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDefault: DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.
